arts.ttl: Sahin "angry and disappointed" after "very weak" Dortmund performance
arts.sum: Nuri Sahin was frustrated after Borussia Dortmund had to settle for a draw against Hoffenheim.

arts.ttl: MOTM Poll: A Disappointing Draw in Dortmund
arts.sum: Hoffenheim efficiently played out of BVB’s press, and they managed to shut down Felix Nmecha in the midfield, hindering him in progressing the ball as we’ve seen a lot lately. Despite Sahin’s team having shown decent performances lately, they never really came out of first gear, and they were finally punished in stoppage time, when former BVB player, Jacob Bruun Larsen, wrestled the young Yannik Lührs off the ball inside the box and slotted the ball past Gregor Kobel.

arts.ttl: Bruun Larsen returns to deny Dortmund victory with a late goal for Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Gio Reyna’s first goal of the season looked to be enough for Dortmund’s seventh league win, but Hoffenheim substitute Bruun Larsen scored in the first minute of stoppage time when Dortmund’s defense switched off for Haris Tabaković’s cross. The 26-year-old Bruun Larsen – who played for Dortmund 2015-20 with a five-month stint in Stuttgart – fired the ball inside the left post.

arts.ttl: Late drama as Jacob Bruun Larsen denies Borussia Dortmund victory
arts.sum: Jacob Bruun Larsen scored a stoppage-time equaliser as Borussia Dortmund and Hoffenheim shared the spoils in an exciting 1-1 draw at Signal Iduna Park. The first half saw Hoffenheim start brightly, putting pressure on the Dortmund defence and creating several chances.
Borussia Dortmund were unable to hold on to their lead as a late Hoffenheim equalise meant Dortmund drew their third Bundesliga game in a row 1-1. From a Dortmund perspective,…

arts.ttl: Match Thread: Beleaguered Borussia Dortmund vs Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Use those and don’t share any illegal streams in the comments. Streaming: ESPN+ (US), Sky GO Extra (UK)

arts.ttl: Match Preview: Dortmund Look to Beat TSG Hoffenheim Short on Center-backs
arts.sum: The problem is that nobody else on Hoffenheim has been playing that well, and to be honest, Kramaric could be playing on one leg and I would still pick him to score against Dortmund. Nuri Sahin will have to deal with one question above all else: who the heck is going to play center-back?

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund Predicted XI vs Hoffenheim
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund returns to Bundesliga action away to Hoffenheim following their 3-2 loss to Barcelona in the Champions League in midweek. The biggest issue for Dortmund heading into this game…

arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund vs Hoffenheim preview: BVB look to get back to winning ways at home
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund’s upcoming Bundesliga clash with Hoffenheim on Sunday at Signal Iduna Park could prove pivotal, with implications for both the race at the top and the battle to avoid the drop at the bottom of the table.

arts.ttl: Preview: Borussia Dortmund vs. Hoffenheim - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Bundesliga clash between Borussia Dortmund and Hoffenheim, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
